name: I tried to celebrate the Hylia Festival, but I fell in love with Daruk instead!
name_original: I tried to celebrate the Hylia Festival, but I fell in love with Daruk instead!
description:
This is a 1-2 hour visual novel made for twitch streamer Yoshinom and his community to enjoy. It's filled with a lot of gags and goofs and plenty of in jokes. 

We plan to add more content as time goes on, so please enjoy this cursed love letter to a community and various genres of gaming.

Full credits are in-game however, THANK YOU  @neaneedssleep, @sludgewolf, @galacticus__, @KBarrCapybara, and @CringingCrisis FOR ALL YOUR HARD WORK.

WE DO NOT OWN DARUK OR ANY OTHER THINGS FROM NINTENDO THAT ARE USED IN THIS. THE SAME GOES FOR MASTER CHIEF. THE VARIOUS MUSICS BELONG TO NINTENDO, AKABEISOFT2, ZIZZ STUDIO, TOBY FOX, AND NOKIA. ANYTHING NOT MENTIONED HERE IS IN THE CREDITS.
